DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine folic acid supplementation lower adenoma recurrence rate . Secondary - Determine number adenoma per patient size histology adenoma . - Assess interaction folic acid alcohol , methionine , aspirin intake . - Assess interaction folic acid pretrial midtrial folate level . - Assess complementary biomarkers DNA methylation blood folate level risk factor polyp recurrence . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral folic acid daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo daily . At least 1 year begin treatment , patient send blood collection kit order measure plasma vitamin B12 level , measure folate ass compliance .
